paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing found a substitution of valine to isoleucine at position 142 on the TTR gene confirming the diagnosis of hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is confirmed to be pathogenic in the context of hereditary TTR amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The patient was started on tafamadis for treatment.
key_quotes: Genetic testing found a substitution of valine to isoleucine at position 142 on the TTR gene confirming the diagnosis of hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
